title: The Last Resort
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B0052UX3V6Suspense/ThrillerWhen Jack Spencer, Head of Security for Fairview Mountain Resort, calls about a missing coed, computer tech and sometimes troubleshooter Carrie Anderson answers. Jack knows Carrie has a unique set of skills - on the side she's part of a team that helps domestic violence victims escape their abusers.Complicating things for Carrie is the handsome new attorney in town. What she finds in her search for the missing girl, will test her ability at making people disappear and put all their lives in danger.20% of all proceeds from this book will go to domestic violence charities.
author: Valerie Douglas
